work_professional.gurmukhi: ਕਰਮੀ ਆਵੈ ਕਪੜਾ ਨਦਰੀ ਮੋਖੁ ਦੁਆਰੁ
work_professional.pronunciation: karmee aavai kaparraa nadaree mokh duaar
work_professional.translation: Through karma, comes the robe of honor; through His Grace, the door of liberation.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Hard work and ethical conduct in professional life leads to success.
work_professional.practical_advice: Work diligently and honestly, but remember results are in God's hands.

work_professional.gurmukhi: ਘਾਲਿ ਖਾਇ ਕਿਛੁ ਹਥਹੁ ਦੇਇ ਨਾਨਕ ਰਾਹੁ ਪਛਾਣਹਿ ਸੇਇ
work_professional.pronunciation: ghaal khaae kichh hathahu dei naanak raahu pachaanahi sei
work_professional.translation: One who works for what they eat, and gives some of what they earn - O Nanak, they know the Path.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Honest earning and sharing with others is the foundation of righteous living.
work_professional.practical_advice: Earn through honest means and always share your blessings.

work_professional.gurmukhi: ਕਾਮੁ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੁ ਅਹੰਕਾਰੁ ਲੋਭੁ ਹਉਮੈ ਅਮਰੁ ਖਾਇ
work_professional.pronunciation: kaam krodh ahankaar lobh haumai amar khaai
work_professional.translation: Lust, anger, egotism, greed and attachment are consuming this mortal.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Workplace stress often stems from ego, greed, and attachment to outcomes.
work_professional.practical_advice: Practice humility and detachment when facing professional challenges.

work_professional.gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਕੀ ਸੇਵਾ ਸਫਲ ਹੈ ਜੇ ਕੋ ਕਰੇ ਚਿਤੁ ਲਾਇ
work_professional.pronunciation: satigur kee sevaa safal hai je ko kare chit laai
work_professional.translation: Service to the True Guru is fruitful, if one does it with a sincere heart.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Dedicated service with full attention brings the best results.
work_professional.practical_advice: Whatever work you do, do it with complete focus and dedication.

work_professional.translation: Those who serve Him are honored.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: True honor comes from service, not from position or power.
work_professional.practical_advice: Focus on serving others through your work rather than seeking recognition.

family_relationships.gurmukhi: ਮਾਤ ਪਿਤਾ ਕੀ ਸੇਵਾ ਕਰੇ ਅੰਤ ਕਾਲਿ ਨ ਛੋਡੈ ਸੰਗੁ
family_relationships.pronunciation: maat pitaa kee sevaa kare ant kaal na chhodai sang
family_relationships.translation: One who serves their mother and father - their company shall not leave them even at the time of death.
family_relationships.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
family_relationships.modern_context: Caring for elderly parents is a sacred duty that brings spiritual merit.
family_relationships.practical_advice: Make time for your parents despite busy schedules.

family_relationships.gurmukhi: ਇਸਤ੍ਰੀ ਪੁਰਖੈ ਜਾਂ ਨਿਸਿ ਮੇਲੁ ਓਇ ਆਪਣੇ ਕਰਮ ਕਮਾਇ
family_relationships.pronunciation: istaree purakhai jaan nis mel oi aapane karam kamaai
family_relationships.translation: When husband and wife come together at night, they perform their own actions.
family_relationships.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
family_relationships.modern_context: Marriage requires mutual respect and understanding of each other's nature.
family_relationships.practical_advice: Build your relationship on spiritual values and mutual respect.

family_relationships.translation: In each and every home, the One Word resonates.
family_relationships.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
family_relationships.modern_context: Divine presence should be felt in every family home.
family_relationships.practical_advice: Create a spiritual atmosphere at home for family harmony.

mental_wellness.translation: The Name of the Lord is the medicine for all diseases.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Mental health issues can be helped through spiritual practice.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: Spend time in Naam Simran when feeling anxious or depressed.

mental_wellness.gurmukhi: ਨਾਨਕ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਮਤਿ ਕਰਹੁ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਤਿਸ ਹੀ ਹੇਇ
mental_wellness.pronunciation: naanak chintaa mat karahu chintaa tis hee hei
mental_wellness.translation: O Nanak, do not worry; the Lord will take care of you.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Excessive worrying causes mental distress. Faith brings peace.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: When overwhelmed by worries, remember God is taking care of everything.

mental_wellness.gurmukhi: ਸੁਖ ਦੁਖ ਦੋਨੋ ਸਮ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਨੈ
mental_wellness.pronunciation: sukh dukh dono sam kar jaanai
mental_wellness.translation: One who looks upon pleasure and pain as one and the same.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Mental wellness comes from maintaining emotional balance.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: Practice accepting both positive and negative experiences.

mental_wellness.gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਰੇ ਸਦਾ ਰਹੁ ਹਰਿ ਕੇ ਨਾਲਿ
mental_wellness.pronunciation: man re sadaa rahu har ke naal
mental_wellness.translation: O mind, always remain with the Lord.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Mental stability comes from connecting with the divine.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: Keep your mind focused on spiritual thoughts throughout the day.

mental_wellness.translation: The mind is pleased, and the mind is honored.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Inner peace comes from a satisfied and content mind.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: Find contentment within rather than seeking external validation.

technology_balance.gurmukhi: ਮਾਇਆ ਮੋਹਣੀ ਮੋਹਿਆ ਮੋਹਣੀ ਮੋਹੈ ਮਾਇ
technology_balance.pronunciation: maiaa mohanee mohiaa mohanee mohai maai
technology_balance.translation: Maya is fascinating and deluding; the fascinating Maya has fascinated my mind.
technology_balance.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
technology_balance.modern_context: Digital devices can be like Maya - fascinating but distracting.
technology_balance.practical_advice: Set boundaries with technology for spiritual growth.

technology_balance.gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਕੀ ਮਤਿ ਤਿਆਗਿ ਸੁਆਮੀ ਚਰਣੀ ਲਾਗੁ
technology_balance.pronunciation: man kee mat tiaag suaamee charnee laag
technology_balance.translation: Abandon the cleverness of your mind, and grasp hold of your Lord and Master's feet.
technology_balance.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
technology_balance.modern_context: Digital distractions scatter mental focus. Train mind for divine focus.
technology_balance.practical_advice: Replace mindless scrolling with mindful spiritual practice.

spiritual_practice.gurmukhi: ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲਾ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਉ ਵਡਿਆਈ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ
spiritual_practice.pronunciation: amrit velaa sach naau vadiaaee veechaar
spiritual_practice.translation: In the Amrit Vela, the ambrosial hours before dawn, chant the True Name, and contemplate His Glorious Greatness.
spiritual_practice.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
spiritual_practice.modern_context: Starting the day with spiritual practice sets a positive tone.
spiritual_practice.practical_advice: Wake up early for meditation and prayer.

spiritual_practice.translation: Practice meditation, austerity, self-discipline and righteousness.
spiritual_practice.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
spiritual_practice.modern_context: Consistent spiritual practice requires discipline and commitment.
spiritual_practice.practical_advice: Start with small, consistent spiritual practices.

community_service.translation: One who serves all beings finds peace.
community_service.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
community_service.modern_context: Serving others brings inner peace and fulfillment.
community_service.practical_advice: Look for opportunities to help others in your community.

personal_growth.translation: First, remove the falsehood of the mind.
personal_growth.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
personal_growth.practical_advice: Examine your thoughts and motivations for truth.

life_transitions.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
life_transitions.modern_context: Accepting divine will brings peace during life changes.
life_transitions.practical_advice: Focus on what you can control and surrender the rest.

health_healing.gurmukhi: ਤਨੁ ਮਨੁ ਧਨੁ ਸਭੁ ਸਉਪਿ ਗੁਰ ਕਉ
health_healing.pronunciation: tan man dhan sabh saupi gur kau
health_healing.translation: Surrender body, mind and wealth to the Guru.
health_healing.author: Guru Amar Das Ji
health_healing.modern_context: Health challenges require both medical care and spiritual surrender.
health_healing.practical_advice: Seek proper treatment while maintaining faith.

financial_guidance.translation: Contentment is the medicine for all ailments.
financial_guidance.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
financial_guidance.modern_context: Financial stress comes from endless desires. Contentment brings peace.
financial_guidance.practical_advice: Practice gratitude and live within your means.
